comment_text: That's how I got my first job out of college. Actually when I walked into the interview room, they had my program on a projector, the code loaded into an IDE, and asked me to explain everything. Then they loaded their apps on to the projectors and basically did the inverse for me. A very nice interview. The final portion was their most junior developer who told me just to ask whatever questions I wanted that would help me decide whether I wanted to work there.
author: logn
story_title: Ask HN: Why are Silicon Valley interviews such a drag now?
